name: Never BreakUp Beta
description:
Join Discord channel to discuss https://discord.gg/CyzUyTN

This is free beta version of Never BreakUp, we will bring the Full version online soon, please add Full version to your wishlist if you like our game.
《Neverbreakup》 is a cute style of jumping action platform game, which filled with amusement and joyfulness.

In the game, the chubby and round animal image and their clumsy appearances trapped by the rope make people laugh and joyful; the operation of the game is full of amusement and always out of expectation.
You will experience more hilarious classic scenes and eureka moments of your game operation. Hurry up and call your friends to enjoy the game together!

There are a variety of confrontation modes in the game, including race, brawl, etc. In these modes, you can provoke and trick your opponents without fear, whether by swallowing them and spitting them into the trap or blocking the way with ropes or even destroying the mechanism. Remember what is the only goal? Victory!

In a more peaceful plot mode, your goal is to get rid of the alien's capture and escape into the flying saucer (A Giant Bowl) safely. You need to face to different challenges such as many tricky traps and cute but ruthless aliens, and also, collaborating with teammates matched cross platform. Cooperation or mutual drag? It's entirely up to you to decide...
（Actually, it is fate)
Good luck! b(O`v O`）

You can use the gold coins obtained from levels to extract rich and varied skin and appearance accessories! From the cute and honest Pug to the silly and cool shark, you can change your outfit freely and become the most eye-catching star in the competition!

The Beta version include:
- 7 Levels of Story-Mode/Racing-Mode
-1 mini game mode (Brawl)
-Single mode,Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer

The Full version include:
- 42 Levels of Story-Mode/Racing-Mode
-3 mini game mode (Brawl,Football,Carrot)
-Single mode,Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer
